name: Shapes of death (JB)
description:
Your goal is to die.
You do this by getting a score of 0. If you get a score of 5000 you will lose.

There a 3 different types of Enemy's. Spikes, Cubes and Cycles.
Only the cubes can give you points, but there are a lot of them and it is easy to get points from them.

You will see how they work, but here are 2 tip's:
-Jump on the Cubes
-The cycles remove a lot of points

You can use the following keys:
A, D, ESC and Space
In the pausemenu space presses a button.

This is my first Game Jam and my first game, that i publish.
I would like to get feedback

(It may be a bit buggy and the speed of the Enemy's could be a bit of.)

I don't know why Unity Weblog is zoomen in that much. Im also happy that i could upload a more or less working version. Anyways i hat fun and learned something.
